Retrieved February 29, 2016 ==Biography== Pedro Maldonado was born in Spain and ordained a priest in the Order of Friars Minor. On 23 Jan 1559, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Paul IV as Bishop of Mondoñedo. He served as Bishop of Mondoñedo until his death on 2 Jul 1566. == References == Category:16th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Paul IV Category:1566 deaths Category:Franciscan bishops
